summary: This is a WIP, help would be appreciated, check the comments for upcoming updates and what i am currently working on. message me or comment if you want to help.
descriptionHtml:
Like to kill the undead? want to show the dawnguard how to get the job done properly? this mod will let you do just that. You will follow in the path of the Hunters Guild and slay vampires, skeletons and more of the undead beasts of skyrim to discover the history of this ancient clan.
(installation help at the bottom)

What the mod adds:
- A forgable axe that will kill the undead with ease

To be added:
- A book about the hunters guild
- A note from the last hunter
- A home for the hunters guild
- More new weapons and armor
- A short quest line
- A dungeon or two
- A new companion
- New items, potions and poisons
- 1 very powerful weapon which will take a lot to get, and trust me I mean a lot

If you would like to help with this mod please leave a comment saying how you could help because i really need any help I can get with this.

Thanks for viewing and hopefully downloading version 0.1.0 which if it is not released yet should be soon.

Installation:
currently the best way is to download manually and add it to the plugins section of NMM, how this is archived I am not to sure of as the creation kit does so for me but if you find a way let me know so i can post it here and credit you for your help.
Also feel free to try using the manager to download as i would love to know if it works :D
author: xKianna
